trends: There have been 63 other sightings in Fresno
There were no other sightings in Fresno on or around September 23rd 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside on my back patio smoking I walked to the end of cement and looked up to see the stars and thats when I seen 3 big red blinking lights in a perfect diamond shape it was high in the sky but lower then the airplane that was flying at the time going the other way also the red lights where bigger then that airplane going the other way,as I was watching these lights I ran back inside to get my boyfriend he came outside to see and it was still there flying or moving slow what ever you would call it we both could not belive what we were seeing and I have never seen anything like that,now I realize I've never seen anything before this ever in my life, I dont know how to explain it but was big.my boyfreind went inside to get his mother they went out the front door im still in the back and still see it. As it goes farther away I see the lights go to a straight line I cant believe what I just seen. I've never seen anything in my 42 years on this earth, but I will tell you this now im a believer and I'll be looking up and out there from now on
Summary: diamond shape 3 big red blinking lights
